clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Gallbladder shows hyperechoic, no stones or wall thickening.
Uterus appears hyperechoic; endometrial thickness measures 27.25 mm.
Prostate is mildly thickened; volume approximately 29.8 cc.
Liver appears hypoechoic with no focal lesions.
Right kidney demonstrates unremarkable, no hydronephrosis.
Placenta is smooth-walled and normally located.
